DifficultyDef.label: Peaceful
DifficultyDef.description:
Build a community in sandbox environment.

Recommendeed for: Players who want to focus on the community-building aspects of RimWorld.

This mode disables major threatening events, but challenges like disease, mental breaks, and mad animals still occur.

DifficultyDef.label: Builder
DifficultyDef.description:
Build a colony, while still having a taste of danger.

Recommended for: Players who are new to this kind of game, and players who want to relax.

Major threats appear, but they're weaker than other modes. Some extremely dangerous events are disabled.

DifficultyDef.label: Medium
DifficultyDef.description: Build a community while facing down dangerous threats.\n\nRecommended for: Experienced strategy game players on their first game of RimWorld, or skilled RimWorld players who want some breathing room to pursue funny or weird goals.

DifficultyDef.label: Rough
DifficultyDef.description:
Struggle to survive on a rough, tough planet.

Recommended for: Players with experience with RimWorld, looking to play an intense story requiring significant skill to survive.

Do not expect to play a perfect clean game. You will lose people. Even if you play well, some challenges will be impossible to overcome without losses. You'll have to fight wounded, sacrifice to survive, and recover. It's all for the drama.

DifficultyDef.label: Hard
DifficultyDef.description:
Face brutal survival challenges. The price of survival is blood.

Recommended for: Players with a lot of experience who want to push themselves.

Succeeding at this level requires a well-rounded understanding of diverse strategies, an disciplined preparation, and luck. Threats can spike and combine in vicious ways.

Even if you play well, many challenges will be impossible to overcome without either deliberate sacrifice or random, unexpected losses. You'll have to fight wounded and recover often. Be ready to lose many people in the struggle to survive.

DifficultyDef.label: Extreme
DifficultyDef.description:
Apply mastery of every RimWorld skill for just a chance to survive a harrowing trial against a cruel, unfair world.

Recommended for: Players who want to face brutal, unfair situations that require the deployment of fluent and well-rounded skills and the sacrifice of treasured people just to avoid losing everything.

There is no clean game here. You'll spend a lot of time fighting wounded and recovering, you'll need to prepare carefully, and you'll need to sacrifice people and things you love. Unfair challenges and capricious death may come to you at any time. This level is about dealing with losses, because preventing them is impossible.
